mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_CATE, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.MEMBER_NUMBER, N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_NUMBER, N.NOTICE_CATE, N.NOTICE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NUMBER, N.NOTICE_REGIST_DATE, N.NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE N.NOTICE_TITLE = #{title}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE (NOTICE_NUMBER, NOTICE_CATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGIST_DATE, MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeCate}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{memberNumber})
